´åè¡Œä¸šå……æ»¡çƒ­æƒ…ï¼Ÿä¸é¢†å…ˆçš„è½¯ä»¶æ¶æ„å¸ˆåˆä½œï¼Œäº†è§£è‹±ç‰¹å°”æœ€æ–°çš„GPUæ¶æ„ï¼Ÿæ‚¨æ˜¯å¦å–œæ¬¢ä¸å„ç§å›¢é˜Ÿåˆä½œï¼Œä»¥å¸®åŠ©è·å¾—ä¸€æµçš„è§†è§‰ä½“éªŒï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æˆ·èƒ½å¤Ÿå°†è‡ªå·±æ²‰æµ¸åœ¨æ–°çš„è§†è§‰æœªæ¥ä¸­ï¼Ÿ The Graphic Architecture Team, is looking for you.As a GPU Architect your responsibilities will include but are not limited to: Developing and driving end-to-end GPU architecture specifications for highly optimized, modular, and scalable GPUs.Conducting comprehensive competitive analysis, standards efforts, and tracking industry trends to inform the development of a feature roadmap that meets platform requirements.Ensuring interoperability of hardware and software throughout the product lifecycle.Definingå¹¶æ¨åŠ¨GPUåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œè¿é€šæ€§ï¼Œé…ç½®ï¼Œæ€§èƒ½ï¼Œæ—¶æœºï¼ŒåŠŸç‡å’ŒåŒºåŸŸç›®æ ‡ã€‚è¯„ä¼°å¯è¡Œæ€§æƒè¡¡å–èˆå¹¶æ¢ç´¢æ–°å‹çš„GPUæ¶æ„ä»¥æœªæ¥äº§å“ã€‚ä¸ºå¤šä¸ªå¸‚åœºé¢†åŸŸè¿›è¡Œä¼˜åŒ–çš„GPUï¼Œä»è¶…ä½çš„ç”µåŠ›ç§»åŠ¨è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆåˆ°é«˜çº§å®ç°çš„GPUï¼Œè¶…çº§éªŒè¯çš„GPUï¼Œè¶…çº§éªŒè¯çš„ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œå®šåˆ¶ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œä»¥åŠå®šåˆ¶çš„ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œå¹¶å¼€å‘äº†GPUS.DEATISEã€‚ and performance modeling of new features, and analyzing results using advanced statistics and data prediction techniques for benchmarking and ROI determination.Providing experimental or proof-of-concept changes to propose design alternatives meeting performance, power, area, and timing constraints.Reviewing, challenging, and influencing cross-functional roadmaps, and defining technology targets for future GPUs.Collaborating with architects, design engineers, verification engineers, and research teams to enhance the overall GPU design and resolve performance bottlenecks and constraintsWorking closely with presilicon and postsilicon teams to debug, root-cause, and identify workarounds for critical failures The ideal candidate will exhibit the following behavioral traits:Ability to drive and improve digital design methodology to achieve high quality visual experiencesStrong verbal and written communication skillsAbility to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environmentUpdated latest GPUæŠ€æœ¯å’Œå®è·µçš„è¿›æ­¥ã€‚èµ„æ ¼ï¼šæ‚¨å¿…é¡»æ‹¥æœ‰æœ€åˆçš„æœ€ä½èµ„æ ¼ã€‚
